mapper.insert: insert into order_detail (detail_id, detail_order, detail_goods, detail_price, detail_num) values (#{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailGoods,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{detailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select detail_id, detail_order, detail_goods, detail_price, detail_num from order_detail
